summary.span: The class contains the instances that the Active Directory hierarchy returned during a query.

span.span: The class contains the instances that the Active Directory hierarchy returned during a query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為實作限制類別無法釋放其所有 unmanaged 資源時回收。Due to implementation restrictions, the class cannot release all of its unmanaged resources when it is garbage collected. 若要避免記憶體流失，您必須呼叫方法時不再需要物件。To prevent a memory leak, you must call the method when the object is no longer needed.

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: Releases all resources that are used by the object.

span.span: Releases all resources that are used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，它可讓所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。The method, it allows the resources that are used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需有關，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). 記憶體回收行程不會釋放記憶體物件。The garbage collector does not release memory for a object. 因此，應用程式必須呼叫明確地防止記憶體流失的方法。Therefore, an application must call the method explicitly to prevent a memory leak.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. 叫用受保護方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。 invokes the protected method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用與`disposing`參數設定為`false`。 invokes with the `disposing` parameter set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this references. 記憶體回收行程不會釋放記憶體物件。The garbage collector does not release memory for a object. 因此，您必須呼叫明確地防止記憶體流失的方法。Therefore, you must call the method explicitly to prevent a memory leak. 這個方法會叫用集合中每個物件的方法。This method invokes the method of each object in the collection. 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

span.para: 方法可以由其他物件呼叫多次。在覆寫方法小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中方法。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

The method can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding the method be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to the method. For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

summary.span: Gets the handle that is returned by the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method that performs the actual search.

span.span: Gets the handle that is returned by the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method that performs the actual search.

summary.span: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

span.span: For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

value.span: 這個集合所使用的 ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE 值。

span.span: The ADS_SEARCH_HANDLE value that this collection uses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立此集合的呼叫[IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp)方法，使查詢結果可 T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection 物件。The that created this collection calls the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) method, which makes the query results available to the T:System.DirectoryServices.SearchResultCollection object. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library ([http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)) 中的＜[IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp)＞主題。For more information, see the [IDirectorySearch::ExecuteSearch](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/adsi/adsi/idirectorysearch_executesearch.asp) topic in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library). 執行查詢時，每次查詢的結果的控制代碼相關聯其物件。Each time that a query is performed, a handle for the results of that query is associated with its object. 這個控制代碼對應到在 ADSI 中的搜尋控制代碼。This handle corresponds to the search handle in ADSI. 這個控制代碼一直保存，直到您呼叫方法物件，因此您必須呼叫以防止記憶體流失。This handle persists until you call the method on the object, so you must call to prevent a memory leak. 記憶體回收行程不會釋放這個特定物件的記憶體。The garbage collector does not free memory for this particular object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，這個屬性是 類別的索引子。In C#, this property is the indexer for the class. 在 JScript，您可以使用類型，所定義的預設索引屬性，但您無法明確地定義您自己。In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. 不過，指定 expando 屬性類別上的會自動提供預設值編製索引的類型是物件的屬性和索引類型為。However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and with an index type of .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會傳回物件，該物件可用來同步處理對 的存取。 returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the . 大部分的集合中的類別命名空間也會實作同步處理方法，這會提供基礎集合周圍同步處理的包裝函式。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a Synchronized method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用以同步存取 的物件。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於那些無法公開使用基礎存放區的集合而言，所預期的實作會傳回目前的執行個體。For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance. 請注意目前的執行個體的指標可能無法完全包裝其他集合，集合這些集合應該傳回基礎集合`SyncRoot`屬性。Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection's `SyncRoot` property. 在 命名空間中大部分的集合類別也實作 `Synchronized` 方法，這會提供基礎集合周圍同步處理的包裝函式。Most collection classes in the namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection. 然而，衍生類別 (Derived Class) 可以使用 屬性，提供它們自己集合的同步化版本。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業的集合，而不是直接在集合。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the collection, not directly on the collection. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 特別是可以與其他可能同時修改集合執行個體的執行緒，保持正常的同步處理。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance. 如果沒有`Synchronized`方法的集合，如的預期使用量看起來像這樣：In the absence of a `Synchronized` method on a collection, the expected usage for looks like this: ```csharp ICollection MyCollection =... lock(MyCollection.SyncRoot) { // Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection as New ICollection() SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot ' Some operation on the collection, which is now thread safe. End SyncLock ``` 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: ```csharp ICollection myCollection = new ICollection(); lock(myCollection.SyncRoot) { foreach (Object item in myCollection) { // Insert your code here. } } ``` ```vb Dim myCollection As New ICollection() Dim item As Object SyncLock myCollection.SyncRoot For Each item In myCollection ' Insert your code here. Next item End SyncLock ```
